text: 14 VERSION CHAIN ORDERING Approach #1: Oldest-to-Newest (02N) — Just append new version to end of the chain. —> Have to traverse chain on look-ups. Approach #2: Newest-to-Oldest (N20) — Have to update index pointers for every new version. — Don't have to traverse chain on look ups. B 4 p DJ % 50:08/1:09:33 - Version Storage > - - - e $ & CO CMU Database Systems - 19 Multi-Version Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
